title: Which computer network enables two or more computers to share information and resources? - Quora

response.answer_text: All types of computer network also enables two or more computer to share information and resources. Let consider Definition of computer network When two or more than two computers are connected with each other through other data communication, it is called computer network. If any computer is connected with such type of network then that computer can easily send and receive data, information, file and computer program etc. on all the computers connected with that network.
